keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Lassa fever, rarely seen in the United States, can have symptoms similar to Ebola but is less infectious and far less likely to be fatal. About 1 percent of Lassa patients die.

headline.print_headline: A Man Dies of Lassa Fever in New Jersey
headline.main: Man in New Jersey Dies of Rare Viral Disease After Returning From Liberia

snippet: Lassa fever, rarely seen in the United States, can have symptoms similar to Ebola but is less infectious and far less likely to be fatal. About 1 percent of Lassa patients die.
abstract: Unidentified man reportedly dies of Lassa fever, rare viral disease, at hospital in New Jersey after returning from Liberia.
